analysis.key_quote: I do not support the proposed Schedule F system, which would politicize the Civil Service and open the doors to favoritism, corruption and inefficiency.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, loss of institutional knowledge, and the importance of a merit-based system. The mention of the Pendleton Act and the risks of a spoils system further underscores the opposition to the rule.
